mapper.select: select expert_id expertId, expert_name expertName, expert_icon expertAvatar, expert_text expertIntroduction, museum_id museumId from expert
select expert_id expertId, expert_name expertName, expert_icon expertAvatar, expert_text expertIntroduction, museum_id museumId from expert where expert_id = #{ expertId }
mapper.insert: insert into expert ( expert_id, expert_name, expert_icon, expert_text, museum_id ) values ( #{ expertId }, #{ expertName }, #{ expertAvatar }, #{ expertIntroduction }, #{ museumId } )
mapper.update: update expert set expert_id = #{ expertId }, expert_name = #{ expertName }, expert_icon = #{ expertAvatar }, expert_text = #{ expertIntroduction }, museum_id = #{ museumId } where expert_id = #{ expertId }
mapper.delete: delete from expert where expert_id = #{ expertId }
